A world where time is currency, and people trade years of their lives for material possessions. The main character, a skilled clockmaker, discovers a way to reverse-engineer time, allowing them to travel through the ages and alter the course of history.

In a future where memories can be extracted and stored, a gifted "memory detective" uses their unique ability to solve crimes by reliving the memories of witnesses and victims. However, as they delve deeper into the case, they begin to question the nature of their own identity and the true cost of their abilities.

A group of strangers wakes up in a mysterious, ever-changing maze with no memory of how they got there. As they navigate the labyrinth, they discover that each room contains a different version of themselves, and they must work together to uncover the truth behind their confinement and the purpose of the maze.

In a post-apocalyptic world where the sun has been extinguished, a young girl discovers she has the ability to harness the power of the stars. As she embarks on a journey to find a way to restore the sun, she must confront the dark forces that seek to exploit her gift for their own gain.

A scientist creates a machine that can record and play back human emotions, allowing people to experience the feelings of others. However, as the technology becomes more widespread, it leads to a society where people become addicted to the emotions of others, and the scientist must confront the consequences of their invention.
